marc:datafield.marc:subfield: AMAP of the COUNTRIES AND PLACES, mentioned IN THE NEW TESTAMENT
Includes 2 inset maps: "A plan of Jerusalem at the Time of Our Savior" and "A map of Judea under Herod the Great and his three sons, Archelas, Herod-Antipas and Philip".
1 map with 2 insets : colored ; 24 x 43 cm on sheet 46 x 59 cm
Map scales include: Roman miles, Travelling leagues, Common French leagues, and British miles. Maps use the Ferro meridian.
